website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality, powerful model has all the features of a modern microwave in a contemporary, attractive design.
pros: Cooks food quickly and exhaust fan performs well
Features a kitchen timer and programmable night light in addition to several cooking settings
cons: Some customers complain that this model is fairly noisy

customer_reviews.title: Quality GE microwave!! Make sure you read the direction sheet when installing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microwave a few days ago, it replaced my old GE we had for 11 years. Great microwave so far. Only thing, make sure you use the measurement template sheet that comes with the direction booklet. I didn't and it took me longer to install with four additional holes in my cabinet, which I'm trying to forget about.
customer_reviews.author: HChanner

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful/functional for a great price... BUT beware of shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is solid, best I've ever used (though who's used more than like 15 ever, right?) Very happy with the style and functionality however as the negative reviews suggest, we had a dent in the box which presented a bend in the metal in the back. Since it was in the back, we installed it anyway and are very happy with the machine. Just be vigilant in inspecting it when it comes and you'll have a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Features from Former Product with Same Model Number
customer_reviews.text: Although the unit arrived safely and without damage, it requires a separate charcoal filter kit that was NOT included and the product description failed to flag this requirement, when ordered. We shall see whether or not the negative press related to this microwave's durability is accurate, but it seems to function better that the same, 17 year old unit, with the same model number, it has replaced! The features are different, but improved! Let's see what happens!
customer_reviews.author: TAT

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product less than two months. A few days ago, and stop warming anything. We tried all the troubleshooting. A repair person came out and checked it – told us he would have to replace two components which would take a week for him to get. As a microwave is my primary tool for cooking, now I am out of a way to warm food for a week. In fairness, I will say that their customer support is responsesive and scheduling a maintenance visit online is easy.
customer_reviews.author: DC Whitesides

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward install. Hope this lasts longer than the last one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an older model of a very similar microwave. The other one died while steaming broccoli. Hopefully this one lasts longer. The great thing is that it fit on the old mounting bracket. It does not come with the filters for the vent fan. We had to order them after. Our GE dishwasher died a couple weeks after this was replaced. A bit disappointed with GE right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy at a good price.  Performs very well.
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement for my previous 30" GE range. Fit the same mounting bracket. Unfortunately, the front vents have been moved to the top face rather than the front. I had to build up the back wall to mount it under 15" depth cabinets; it appears to be designed for 13" cabinets. I like the look better as a font-top vented unit. But, I could have done without the extra work.
customer_reviews.author: D Frate

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave worked for a week. After that, it turns on but it does not heat anything. If you want a microwave that looks pretty and doesn't work, then get it. Update: seller refunded and I purchased again . Reason being we don’t want to change the mount. Hoping this time it works.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like, is that if you just finished cooking something
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like, is that if you just finished cooking something, and where busy, come back after a few minutes and want to add 30 seconds more for example, you have to open the door, and close it again, before it lets you add "new" time...
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Not heating
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 15 months agi and is not working any more, what can be done, theproble is not heating any more
customer_reviews.author: L,enterprice

customer_reviews.title: GE JVM7195SKSS 30" over-the-range microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: Received the item in timely manner from 1-Stop Camera Shop. Package in great condition and contents intact and working. Our previous GE lasted for over 10 years; so hoping for similar success with this one. Dimensions were true. We had trouble with the template. It seemed backwards on hole placements. This is similar enough to our previous model that we've been able to use without much reading.
customer_reviews.author: Pete from Paducah, KY

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived dented in multiple places
customer_reviews.text: The microwave was delivered and upon opening the box found the metal housing was dented. Not in one place but on all sides. The back is so dented that it would not be able to be hung on the brackets. The edge is dented which caused the back to bend outward to the point it would not sit flush against the wall. Very disappointed. This was supposed to replace a GE Profile Microwave that lasted 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews were correct; it is a bit of work to change out the vent system for a different style cabinet but it works well and is fairly quiet. I like the express settings and the 2 light options. Overall a nice microwave.
customer_reviews.author: dfoss

customer_reviews.title: Tinny compared to earlier model
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the same GE model we installed a number of years back which was taken out by a power surge. This newer model is notably tinnier and less solid than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: WTP

customer_reviews.title: Last 18 months, doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: The door creaks when opening and closing, the door vibrates annoyingly when microwaving something (started about 6 months ago) and now it runs when plugged into an outlet and won't shut off. It will still microwave things but you have to unplug it to shut it off. I guess this is an internal board problems but why fix it with all the rattling and door problems? It's pretty much junk.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Chatara

customer_reviews.title: Even replacement doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Installed to replace a previous GE and it was not working within the same day. Replacement came and within 3 days the control panel began to shut off. It now shuts off daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Literally one year later the stainless steel wrap on the handle is peeling off and now the entire microwave is dead. No power, nothing. A week or two prior to it dying completely it would sporadically not heat food at various times.
customer_reviews.author: jspann23

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but is noisy when in operation, my last one was a 6.5 year old Samsung and was very quiet when in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Consider it a short term rental
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 years in, it died on me (of course no longer covered) . It started making strange noises a few months ago but kept working, today heating up my coffee.. the house filled with smoke and its less than 2 years old. Its a nice standard unit when it works, but replacing it every two years is not worth it. GE quality continues to go down hill fast. I would recommend looking at a different brand or unit
customer_reviews.author: john mac

customer_reviews.title: delivery was faster than expected
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived 5 days earlier than web indicated. The microwave works fine. will see if it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: professional

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is exactly what I ordered and it arrived fast. But it didn’t work, it made a loud noise when turned on. I had to return it and luckily got my money back. I didn’t have to pay for return shipping. I ended up buying it instead from Best Buy because I didn’t want to risk getting another from here that didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for GE Spacemaker XL 1800
customer_reviews.text: Same dimension of discontinued GE Spacemaker XL1800. Very easy to replace the 12-yrs old one and it works great so far. Will see if this GE JVM71955KSS Microwave Model can work as good as the GE Spacemaker XL 1800 Model. Sty tuned...
customer_reviews.author: Dat T Tran

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Out original version died. Bought this and replaced it in minutes. Heats food quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave but watch for damage.
customer_reviews.text: I got the microwave and the top of it was dented in 3 or 4 spots. The users manual is missing as well. It works fine and you can’t see the dents but I am concerned about the impact it took to cause the dents. I would not have installed it but we had no microwave. The templates were also very inadequate.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy of a GE name.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a clankingnoise when you close door. The glass round tray does not fit the slots properly Uneven heating. Dissapointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: microwave was severely damaged but box was okay. So shipped damaged from the warehouse. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ed in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Door Handle was broken after only 11 months use
customer_reviews.text: The door handle was broken after only 11 months use. We barely use microwave, but it was still broken beyond wear and tear. The quality is not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Came dented on both sides
customer_reviews.text: When the package came, the top was dented. It's as if it had been thrown around. I am not satisfied with this, but we will keep it. We probably won't get as much for a refund if we return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Parker

customer_reviews.title: Handle broken after only one year!
customer_reviews.text: You have to pull the handle to open the door. The top part of the handle is snapped inside. Only one year of use!
customer_reviews.author: BWS

customer_reviews.title: Replacement microwave fit nicely, however
customer_reviews.text: Replacement microwave fit nicely, however, stats show it as being 1000 watt. Must not be because, popcorn setting leaves far too many kernels un-popped. Old 1000 watt micro popped it all at 2.0 minutes. Not this one. Very disappointed in this kind of performance! Not sure anything can be done about it but would like to return.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Triplett

customer_reviews.title: $200 LESS THAN RETAIL STORES
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July of 2018. Price was $200 less than local retailers - enough to pay for Prime for 2 years! Installation was simple and forward. If you can read, you CAN install it. Works perfectly no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: installed myself
customer_reviews.text: pro powerful, easy install. like the one push button, many features. con no operating instructions (manual)
customer_reviews.author: ponso

customer_reviews.title: Handle is peeling
customer_reviews.text: Very soon after buying the handle that look like metal start to peel. Now it look pretty ugly and unpleasant to touch. To chip material and tho low quality
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Matched our expectations, easy to install, and does our microwave work as expected...exceeding expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Princess

customer_reviews.title: Ok design
customer_reviews.text: Like the look bc it looks like my old one. Dislike the panel/too many buttons and a pain in the neck to push buttons
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: Emblem doesn't match Photo..
customer_reviews.text: Only disappointed with GE emblem. In the Picture it has dark and bright silver raised GE emblem. What I received has the emblem is light gray and flat GE emblem.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: much sturdier than 4 year old Bosch unit; love temp sensor and easy to follow, on touch pad directions
customer_reviews.author: johnd

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: After returning a "warehouse deal" the full priced model was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BUCSROD

customer_reviews.title: do not buy one of these things, junk, terrible grinding sound just after warranty, no help
customer_reviews.text: only 3 months out of warranty and this thing makes sounds that would scare small children, no help from ge
customer_reviews.author: jane lizotte

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Had this for less than 2 months and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Llewelyn

customer_reviews.title: Overhead microwave
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had a little stress installing because it is slightly different in size from my old one
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Koehn

customer_reviews.title: Should of purchased parts to fix the old one I had .
customer_reviews.text: Damaged so doesn't install properly and was missing parts. Very loud when hearing anything!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Do not like. The number are too light and the panel ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not like. The number are too light and the panel to dark that I have to use a flashlight to red numbers when I use. The inside of the oven is black and very hard to see your food. We are General contractors for new single family homes. We will dfinitely be warning our customers about not buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a large dent in the side. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a large dent in the side. We sent it back, but based on reviews we are ordering it again - hoping this one arrives undamaged!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Neece

customer_reviews.title: Installed rather than go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.text: It was slightly damaged from shipping and was supposed to include two grease filter screens but only had one.
customer_reviews.author: John Hall

customer_reviews.title: This is a replacement for my GE Profile microwave which ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my GE Profile microwave which died in less than 3 years. This unit has a very light door that sounds cheap when you close it. My biggest problem with this unit is there is no light display, so it is very hard to see what you are pushing. Also, the rotating turn table sits on a very flimsy triad base which is difficult to use. If this wasn't already installed, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: jdp

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived extremely damaged. It looked like it was repacked damaged because the box looked fine
customer_reviews.author: cottonwilly

customer_reviews.title: Problem Microwave
customer_reviews.text: The Microwave not working properly. Wrote a complaint to Amazon on o8/28/2017; just after purchasing and having it installed. Now 09/01/2019 the microwave is not working. No response ever from the Vendor pertaining to the complaint. It is a G E microwave. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Gopal Panday

customer_reviews.title: Missing components
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived looking like it was previously open and returned. Missing hardware for mounting the bracket and microwave to upper cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Li

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it due to a big dent on one side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape. Replacement for a ten year old GE microwave took about one hour. The rear bracket was the same but had to drill new holes for the front screws. Seems to work great and was half the price of the old unit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Zipfel

customer_reviews.title: The microwave works great my husband installed it!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Microwave, but I didn’t like that it didn’t arrive on time. It was too much hassle for them to deliver it on time. I should off just bought it at Lowe’s or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: I feeling LOVE this game kinda reminds me of dead rising

customer_reviews.title: Price and delivery were excellent. Mounting took all of 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Price and delivery were excellent. Mounting took all of 30 minutes. Operates perfectly. The only problem I have with it is that it arrived with a small dent on the front but I could not exchange it because I had 4 under-6-year-olds coming for a week, so I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Umañita

product_meta.title: GE JVM7195SKSS Microwave, 30 inches, Stainless Steel
feature_bullets: Automatically adjusts time and power for delicious cooking results
Worry-free melting of butter, caramel, chocolate and cheese
Light indicates when odor-removing charcoal filter needs to be replaced

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars118 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
